meanings.sent1: She was unzealous about attending the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The unzealous response to the proposal disappointed everyone.
meanings.sent3: His unzealous reaction to winning the lottery was quite unexpected.
meanings.sent4: The unzealous applause echoed through the empty hall.
meanings.sent5: The unzealous performance lacked energy and excitement.

meanings.sent1: The team's unzealous effort led to a loss in the game.
meanings.sent2: Her unzealous attitude towards her job was evident to her colleagues.
meanings.sent3: The unzealous attempt to bake a cake resulted in a burnt mess.
meanings.sent4: The unzealous progress of the project worried the manager.
meanings.sent5: His unzealous speech failed to inspire the audience.
